Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{2: "Of course she's here.", 3: '5', 4: 'Who is it?', 5: '5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Welcome, Karenina.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'No armed fighting in the office area of the base. Please drop your weapons.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Was it blocked?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'How could you block such a raid?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Captain Bianca has informed us of the exact dispatch time of reinforcements in this mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Tsk, so that's why.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Lucia, don't think you can get rid of me! As long as we work together, I'll always aim at your back!", 4: '2'}
{2: "Isn't that a sneak attack?", 3: '21', 4: 'Karenina...', 5: '24'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The commandant is right. Is there any justice in a sneak attack?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Don't think I'll let you off the hook by asking the commandant for help. Be prepared to fight with me, Lucia!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'But is there any justice in a sneak attack?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're right. Lucia, when are you going to have a face-to-face and one-on-one fair showdown with me?!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's make sure the task goes well first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It's a deal then. No backing out!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Then what are you waiting for? Go get the job done!', 4: '2'}
{2: "Let's get started.", 3: '40', 4: 'Is it over for now?', 5: '40'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...She's exactly the same as Bianca said.", 4: '1'}
